name: The Babysitter
storyline: You are a babysitter and your aim is to stop crying the baby before its parents arrive. You have 25 minutes on the dot. You have no time to waste - get Joey to stop crying and go to bed!
summary: A time-based -each command counts for a minute- text-based adventure game of only two rooms, and with 5 objects to manipulate. It was created at 2015. It was found on playfic.
